abilities.description: Your cuddly furball coos softly to soothe your worries. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.c2c2f31f564caa06]{Hearten} in the presence of your furball, boost. However, stress can physically harm your friend. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm} in the presence of your furball, your @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d34cdf2408cd22b6]{Companion Takes a Hit} as well.

When you make an Adventure move (not @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.8d9830fb825057b0]{Check Your Gear}) using your furball to help defuse a tense situation, to build good will between people, to encourage those with a broken spirit, or to support the downtrodden, boost.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.05909d6310d209a6]{Make a Connection} move (not a progress move) with a fellow furball caretaker in the presence of your furballs, boost.
